name: SLIPPY THE FROG 🐸💦
description:
WHOLESOME MINIGAMES / CUTE COMEDY ADVENTURE


You control Slippy the square, soaking, frog as he travels the land solving peoples problems by entering their mind mini games.




Gameplay

  • MIND MINI GAMES - you gotta hop in their heads and fix their problems
  • FRIENDS - Slippy makes, like, a million friends on the way
  • FBI WORK - Slippy is stepping in for the FBI on this job, so the stakes are pretty high
  • FROGS - money back guarantee if there isn't at least one frog in your game
  • PARTY - after completing his job, SLIPPY attends a rad party

Short Game
40 hour games? YAWN - Slippy is short and jam packed with stuff to do.



Interactive
SLIPPY is a fully interactable piece of software known as a computer game.


Thank you for playing my game!
I've loved making this game so thank you for checking it out :D <3
